title: Forecast Monthly Cargo Volume
description: A port director asks an analyst to forecast the container volume for the next month to plan for labor and equipment needs.

tasks.description: Retrieve historical cargo volume data for the same month over the past 5 years.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst pulls the historical volume data.

tasks.description: Analyze the historical data, considering seasonality and year-over-year growth trends.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analyst identifies a consistent 5% growth trend for that month.

tasks.description: Generate a forecast for the coming month and present it in a report.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report is created forecasting the expected TEU (Twenty-foot Equivalent Unit) volume.
